alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:03AM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Storm total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with locally higher amounts up to 3 feet. Winds gusting upwards of 50 to 60 mph through this evening. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
